official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Transportation to designate a portion of California State Route 91 as part of the Interstate System.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to designate a certain portion of California State Route 91 as a route on the National System of Interstate and Defense Highways. Makes the construction costs of such route eligible for certain Federal-aid highway funds. States that the mileage of such route shall not be charged against certain statutory limitations.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Transportation to designate a portion of California State Route 91 as part of the Interstate System.
